if [ -f /etc/init.d/zfs-modules ]; then /sbin/chkconfig --add zfs-modules fi
# double check that the package with kernel number are installed package_version="-0.6.2-1.el6.x86_64" # rpm -q wants the package version in the name with these packages # i do not understand why.... kernel_version="`/bin/uname -r`$package_version" package_list="kmod-spl-$kernel_version kmod-spl-devel-$kernel_version kmod-zfs-$kernel_version kmod-zfs-devel-$kernel_version kmod-zfs-devel"
for i in $package_list; do if ! rpm -q $i ; then /usr/bin/yum install $i; fi done
